instruction: Create an example of a data visualization chart to express the given data.
output: A bar chart with a title of "China Population 2020" showing the population of 1,439,323,776 people. On the left side, a list of central China’s provinces with the corresponding population shown in bars on the right. The color of the bars could gradually change in order to represent the different size of provinces and the total amount of people. The population figure is also displayed on the right corner in the form of a number.
